name: Wetsus, European Centre of Excellence for Sustainable Water Technology
goal:
Wetsus is a facilitating intermediary for trend-setting know-how development and uses a unique innovation model. Wetsusâ€™ main activity is the coordination of a world leading research program.
The inspiring and multidisciplinary collaboration between companies and research institutes in Wetsus results in innovations that contribute significantly to the solution of the global water problems.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Wetsus participates in Horizon2020 and Interreg projects. Interest in research, education, innovation and interregional cooperation, especially in the context of RIS3.
